name: Damien, the Demonologist
description:
Theme Interpretation, Protect:

Protect yourself from demons by solving math problems.

Note:

This game is inspired to my other game Giuseppe, The Soul Collector, which is a typing game that won the most rated in Mini Jam 92: Death

Goal:
  • To hunt as many demons as you can by solving math problems.
  • To gain a lot of score.
Game Background:
  • The king has ordered you to hunt demons on a certain place, and he also said that the more demons hunted, the better the rewards.
Mechanics: 
  • Solve as many math problems as you can, every second and every mistake is a decrease of Health, overtime the problems gets harder.
  • Press Esc to pause the game.
Features:
  • Has Addition and Subtraction Game Mode!
  • Has different types of demons, each monster has a different value and they spawn depending on rarity, the more demons you hunted, the better will spawn.
  • Music that gets you solving! :D
  • When you solve questions accurately, you will get on a streak that doubles the and score  acquired.
